alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 1:40AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Dale, southeastern Coffee and western Geneva Counties through 215 AM CST... At 140 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Brockton to near Samson to near Florala. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Samson, New Brockton, Ariton, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Mixons Crossroads, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Clintonville, Roeton and Cairns Aaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
